parameters.query: INSERT INTO exercices_comptables (tenant_id, code, libelle, date_debut, date_fin) VALUES ($1, $2, 'Exercice $3', $4, $5) ON CONFLICT (tenant_id, code) DO NOTHING RETURNING id, code, libelle, date_debut, date_fin;

INSERT INTO journaux_comptables (tenant_id, code, libelle, type, compte_contrepartie) VALUES
($1, 'VE', 'Journal des Ventes', 'ventes', '411000'),
($2, 'AC', 'Journal des Achats', 'achats', '401000'),
($3, 'BQ', 'Journal de Banque', 'banque', '512000'),
($4, 'OD', 'Journal des Opérations Diverses', 'operations_diverses', NULL),
($5, 'AN', 'Journal des À-Nouveaux', 'a_nouveaux', NULL)
ON CONFLICT (tenant_id, code) DO NOTHING RETURNING id, code, libelle;

parameters.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as nb_comptes FROM plan_comptable WHERE tenant_id = $1;
